Net Cash from Financing Activities: net cash provided by used in financing activities
Other Financing Activities: cash received paid on derivative instruments net
Proceeds from Debt: proceeds from issuance of commercial paper
Proceeds from Stock Issuance: proceeds from issuance or sale of equity
Stock Repurchases: payments for repurchase of common stock
payments for repurchase of redeemable preferred stock

Acquisitions (net of cash acquired): payments to acquire businesses net of cash acquired
Capital Expenditures: payments to acquire oil and gas property and equipment
payments to acquire other property plant and equipment
Net Cash from Investing Activities: net cash provided by used in investing activities
Other Investing Activities: proceeds from sale of oil and gas property and equipment

Net Change in Cash: cash and cash equivalents period increase decrease
cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease including exchange rate effect

Changes in Operating Assets and Liabilit: changes in components of working capital associated with financing activities
changes in components of working capital associated with investing and financing activities
increase decrease in accrued taxes payable
increase decrease in other operating assets
increase decrease in other operating liabilities
Net Cash from Operating Activities: net cash provided by used in operating activities
Other Non-Cash Items: gain loss on derivative instruments net pretax
gain loss on disposition of assets1
impairment of oil and gas properties
results of operations dry hole costs
unrealized gain loss on derivatives and commodity contracts
Stock-Based Compensation: excess tax benefit from share based compensation operating activities

__unmapped__: effect of exchange rate on cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents
payments for proceeds from other investing activities
proceeds from repayments of commercial paper
